arts.ttl: Spurs 1-2 Nottingham Forest: Nuno Espirito Santo admits relief after fast start earns visitors crucial Premier League win
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest head coach Nuno Espirito Santo acknowledges that his side were "fortunate" to earn a 2-1 victory over Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League on Monday night.

arts.ttl: Fast-starting Nottingham Forest back up to third with win at Tottenham
arts.sum: First-half goals by Elliot Anderson and Chris Wood helped Nuno Espirito Santo win at his old club.

arts.ttl: Premier League forced to halt VAR in Tottenham vs Nottingham Forest
arts.sum: The second half of Tottenham's fixture with Nottingham Forest on Monday night started without VAR in play due to a fire alarm going off in the hub at Stockley Park

arts.ttl: How to watch Spurs vs Nottingham Forest - TV channel, live stream, kick-off time
arts.sum: Yes, Sky Sports has chosen Spurs vs Forest as part of its weekly Premier League coverage, with the match taking centre stage for Monday Night Football. Tottenham's clash against Nottingham Forest is scheduled to kick off at 8pm on Monday, April 21, from the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Premier League issue explanation after goal disallowed in Tottenham vs Nottingham Forest
arts.sum: Chris Wood was denied a goal in Nottingham Forest's match with Tottenham after a VAR check which utilised the Premier League's new semi-automated offside technology

arts.ttl: Spurs vs. Nottingham Forest team news: Ange Postecoglou rotation? Does Anthony Elanga return?
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur and Nottingham Forest announce their first XIs for Easter Monday's Premier League game.

arts.ttl: Tottenham vs Nottingham Forest: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: Previewing Tottenham vs Nottingham Forest in the Premier League, including TV & live stream details, team news, predicted lineups & score prediction.
